helpText: כן_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________ש.

generic.title: כן_Error updating categories__________________________ש
generic.message: כן_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________ש.

maxDepthExceeded.title: כן_Error updating categories__________________________ש
maxDepthExceeded.message: כן_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________ש.

destinationHasSameName.title: כן_Error updating categories__________________________ש
destinationHasSameName.message: כן_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________ש.

noSchema.title: כן_Schema not found_________________ש
noSchema.message: כן_Item schema not found for user_________________ש.

maxCharacter.title: כן_Error updating categories__________________________ש
maxCharacter.message: כן_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________ש.

deleteInUseCategory.title: כן_Delete category________________ש
deleteInUseCategory.message: כן_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________ש.

custom.title: כן_Custom categories__________________ש
custom.message: כן_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________ש.

arcgis.title: כן_ArcGIS categories__________________ש
arcgis.message: כן_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ש.

iso.title: כן_ISO categories_______________ש
iso.message: כן_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________ש.

inspire.title: כן_INSPIRE categories___________________ש
inspire.message: כן_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________ש.
